p:
6. Summary, and the question of approach. These two fundamental traits,
1. that my “essence” is ex-sistence
2. that my ex-sistence is always mine to become
show ex-sistence to be a unique phenomenon. We are never just objectively present in the universe; we do not just “exist out there” as a thing among other things.
But the question of how to approach ex-sistence is less clear and has to be worked out from within the present analysis. How, then, how are we to properly present ex-sistence?
